_source.text: 3DS is better known by the names used by the various card issuers when they implement the system " Verified by Visa ", " MasterCard Secure Code ", " J/Secure " (JCB International) and " SafeKey " (American Express).

text: 3DS **is** **better** known by the names used by the various card issuers when they implement the system " Verified by Visa ", " **MasterCard** Secure Code ", " J/Secure " (JCB International) and " SafeKey " (**American** **Express**).

_source.text: 3. Because bigger is better still seems to be Fed policy, JPM Chase could acquire Bank of America - Merrill Lynch, creating one of the largest, federally subsidized banking firms in the world.

text: 3. Because bigger **is** **better** still seems to be Fed policy, JPM **Chase** could acquire Bank of America - **Merrill** **Lynch**, creating one of the largest, federally subsidized banking firms in the world.

_source.text: After going public in March 2008, Visa has held up much better than American Express and competitor MasterCard.

text: After going public in March 2008, Visa has held up much **better** **than** **American** **Express** and competitor **MasterCard**.
